name: W' Double Knee Skirt (Black Rinsed)
description:
100% Cotton 'Hubbard' Canvas, 9 oz
The Women's Double Knee Skirt is made from midweight cotton canvas in a relaxed fit with a regular waist. The item also features double-layer knees, inspired by the double knee work pant silhouette. Triple stitching, tool pockets, and a hammer loop are further nods to the item's utilitarian roots. A woven Square Label completes the design.

Model's height is 175 cm and wears size S
100% Cotton (Hubbard canvas)
Relaxed fit, regular waist
Triple stitched
Double-layer knees
Tool pockets and hammer loop
Zip fly
Square Label



Country Of Origin - Tunisia
Imported & Marketed By: Capsul Collective Private Limited, 18/4 Unit 1,Saleh Centre, Cunningham Road, Bangalore 560052.
